full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG, PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL PA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BSGOS BSAM BTAN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,)
